code: import axios from"axios";export const getPReceivedComment=async(spaceId,page,pageSize)=>{const path="/spaces/".concat(spaceId,"/received/get?page=").concat(page,"&size=").concat(pageSize);try{const response=await axios.get(path,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Accept:'application/json',Authorization:'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem('token')}});return response.data;}catch(e){console.error('Error retrieving received comments:',e.message);return false;}};
